Select all text when typing. Press again: Select all text when typing. Press again to select all blocks.
Insert a new block after the selected bl: Insert a new block after the selected block(s).
Insert a new block before the selected b: Insert a new block before the selected block(s).
Tools provide different interactions for: Tools provide different interactions for selecting, navigating, and editing blocks. Toggle between select and edit by pressing Escape and Enter.
Toggle between using the same value for: Toggle between using the same value for all screen sizes or using a unique value per screen size.
Use the same %s on all screensizes.
Upload a video file, pick one from your: Upload a video file, pick one from your media library, or add one with a URL.
Upload an image file, pick one from your: Upload an image file, pick one from your media library, or add one with a URL.
Upload an audio file, pick one from your: Upload an audio file, pick one from your media library, or add one with a URL.
Upload a media file or pick one from you: Upload a media file or pick one from your media library.
To edit this block, you need permission: To edit this block, you need permission to upload media.
The media file has been replaced: The media file has been replaced
An unknown error occurred during creatio: An unknown error occurred during creation. Please try again.
Press ENTER to add this link: Press ENTER to add this link
%d result found, use up and down arrow k: %d result found, use up and down arrow keys to navigate.
%d results found, use up and down arrow keys to navigate.
Select a variation to start with.
Browse all. This will open the main inse: Browse all. This will open the main inserter panel in the editor Toolbar.
A tip for using the block editor: A tip for using the block editor
Use left and right arrow keys to move th: Use left and right arrow keys to move through blocks
Change a block's type by pressing the bl: Change a block's type by pressing the block icon on the toolbar.
Drag files into the editor to automatica: Drag files into the editor to automatically insert media blocks.
Outdent a list by pressing <kbd>backspac: Outdent a list by pressing <kbd>backspace</kbd> at the beginning of a line.
Indent a list by pressing <kbd>space<\/k: Indent a list by pressing <kbd>space</kbd> at the beginning of a line.
While writing, you can press <kbd>\/<\/k: While writing, you can press <kbd>/</kbd> to quickly insert new blocks.
This block has encountered an error and: This block has encountered an error and cannot be previewed.
This block contains unexpected or invali: This block contains unexpected or invalid content.
Move %1$d block from position %2$d down: Move %1$d block from position %2$d down by one place
Move %1$d blocks from position %2$d down by one place
Move %1$d block from position %2$d up by: Move %1$d block from position %2$d up by one place
Move %1$d blocks from position %2$d up by one place
Blocks cannot be moved down as they are: Blocks cannot be moved down as they are already at the bottom
Blocks cannot be moved up as they are al: Blocks cannot be moved up as they are already at the top
Block %1$s is at the beginning of the co: Block %1$s is at the beginning of the content and can’t be moved right
Block %1$s is at the beginning of the content and can’t be moved left
Block %1$s is at the beginning of the content and can’t be moved up
Move %1$s block from position %2$d up to: Move %1$s block from position %2$d up to position %3$d
Block %1$s is at the end of the content: Block %1$s is at the end of the content and can’t be moved right
Block %1$s is at the end of the content and can’t be moved left
Block %1$s is at the end of the content and can’t be moved down
Move %1$s block from position %2$d right: Move %1$s block from position %2$d right to position %3$d
Move %1$s block from position %2$d left: Move %1$s block from position %2$d left to position %3$d
Move %1$s block from position %2$d down: Move %1$s block from position %2$d down to position %3$d

Customize the width for all elements tha: Customise the width for all elements that are assigned to the centre or wide columns.
This color combination may be hard for p: This colour combination may be hard for people to read.
This colour combination may be hard for people to read. Try using a brighter background colour and/or a darker text colour.
This colour combination may be hard for people to read. Try using a darker background colour and/or a brighter text colour.
Enter a word or two \u2014 without space: Enter a word or two — without spaces — to make a unique web address just for this block, called an “anchor.” Then, you’ll be able to link directly to this section of your page.
Use the Tab key and Arrow keys to choose: Use the Tab key and Arrow keys to choose new block location. Use Left and Right Arrow keys to move between nesting levels. Once location is selected, press Enter or Space to move the block.
You are currently in edit mode. To retur: You are currently in edit mode. To return to the navigation mode, press Escape.
You are currently in navigation mode. Na: You are currently in navigation mode. Navigate blocks using the Tab key and Arrow keys. Use Left and Right Arrow keys to move between nesting levels. To exit navigation mode and edit the selected block, press Enter.
